item.title: 交易商关注特朗普与普京会谈，石油扩大周跌幅
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普计划周五在阿拉斯加会见俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京，从而提高了乌克兰战争结束和供应增加的前景，石油延续了自6月底以来的最大单周跌幅。【原文：Oil extended its biggest weekly decline since end-June as US President Donald Trump plans to meet his Russian counterpart Vladimir Putin in Alaska on Friday, raising the prospect of an end to the war in Ukraine and increased supply.】

item.title: 本周重要数据公布前，亚洲市场开局乏力：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲市场开盘谨慎，交易商在等待美国和中国的关键数据，以及中国政府可能延长关税期限。【原文：Asian markets were poised for a cautious open as traders await key US and Chinese data and a possible extension to Beijing’s tariff deadline.】

item.title: 必和必拓领导钢铁企业参与亚洲碳捕集与封存项目
item.description: 全球最大的矿业公司必和必拓集团（BHP Group）周一发表声明称，该公司将领导一个由钢铁制造商和其他工业巨头组成的财团，在亚洲各地调查碳捕集利用与封存（CCUS）的机会。【原文：The world’s biggest miner, BHP Group, will lead a consortium of steelmakers and other industrial giants in investigating opportunities for carbon capture utilization and storage (CCUS) across Asia, it said in a statement Monday.】

item.title: 新西兰总理不指望赢得美国关税缓和令
item.description: 新西兰总理克里斯托弗-卢克松（Christopher Luxon）承认，政府不太可能争取到美国降低对新西兰商品的关税。【原文：New Zealand Prime Minister Christopher Luxon has conceded the government is unlikely to win a reduction in the tariff rate the US has applied to New Zealand goods.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》称英伟达和 AMD 将向美国缴纳中国芯片销售收入的 15
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周日报道，英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.）和先进微设备公司（Advanced Micro Devices Inc.【原文：Nvidia Corp. and Advanced Micro Devices Inc. agreed to pay 15% of their revenues from chip sales to China to the US government as part of a deal with the Trump administration to secure export licenses, the Financial Times reported Sunday.】

item.title: 对冲基金 Schonfeld 的千禧一代老板将基金从边缘拉了回来
item.description:
瑞安-托尔金过去几年过山车般的疯狂经历，为其他急于打入这个富可敌国的贵族市场的奋斗者提供了借鉴。【原文：

Ryan Tolkin’s wild rollercoaster ride of the past few years offers lessons to all the other strivers desperate to crack this market’s lavishly wealthy aristocracy. 

】

item.title: 本周全球商品市场值得关注的五大图表
item.description: 关税动荡冲击了金条市场。柴油库存开始上升，但随着飓风高峰季节的临近，竞争也在加剧。数据中心的电力需求似乎正在为一些清洁技术公司带来巨大回报。此外，作为世界上最大的玉米生产国，美国今年的玉米产量有望大幅增加。【原文：Tariff turmoil has hit the gold bar market. Diesel inventories are starting to rise, but the race is on as peak hurricane season approaches. Data center power demand appears to be paying off big for some clean tech firms. And, expect an abundance of corn this year in the US, the world’s largest producer.】

item.title: 日经新闻》称贝森特认为美国贸易谈判将于 10 月基本结束
item.description: 日经亚洲》援引美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）的采访报道称，美国预计将在 10 月底前基本完成与尚未达成贸易协议的国家的谈判。【原文：The US expects to largely complete negotiations with countries that have yet to secure a trade deal by the end of October, Nikkei Asia reported, citing an interview with Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent.】

item.title: 澳大利亚将降息，行长对政策前景保持乐观
item.description: 随着通胀压力的减弱，澳大利亚央行准备在今年第三次降息，而行长米歇尔-布洛克（Michele Bullock）预计将坚持其对货币政策前景的谨慎立场。【原文：Australia’s central bank is poised to deliver its third interest-rate cut this year as inflationary pressures ebb, while Governor Michele Bullock is expected to stick with her cautious stance on the monetary policy outlook.】

item.title: 对冲基金转向绿色能源，开始押注石油
item.description:
投资组合经理一直在扭转过去四年中占主导地位的策略。【原文：

Portfolio managers have been reversing strategies that have dominated over the past four years.

item.title: Palantir的2500%涨幅令多头难以自圆其说
item.description: Palantir Technologies Inc. 的飞速崛起正将该公司的估值进一步推向创纪录的水平，迫使看好该公司的投资者寄希望于未来日益强劲的增长，以证明其目前的估值水平是合理的。【原文：Palantir Technologies Inc.’s meteoric rise is pushing the company’s valuation further into record territory, forcing bullish investors to bank on increasingly robust future growth to justify its current level.】

item.title: 计算机驱动的交易员看涨股票，人类看跌股票
item.description: 关于股票交易，每个人都有自己的看法。而现在，市场上出现了不寻常的分歧，就像人对机器一样鲜明。【原文：The thing about trading stocks is everyone has an opinion. And right now there’s an unusual divergence in the market that’s as stark as man versus machine.】

item.title: 美国加征关税后，瑞士领导人寻求与罗氏和诺华谈判
item.description: 瑞士政府发言人表示，在瑞士被美国征收发达国家中最高的关税后，瑞士政府已与当地制药商罗氏控股公司（Roche Holding AG）和诺华公司（Novartis AG）进行了接触，讨论关税问题。【原文：Switzerland’s government has reached out to local drugmakers Roche Holding AG and Novartis AG to discuss the tariff situation, a spokesperson said, after the country was hit with the highest US levies in the developed world.】

item.title: 美联储减息在即，套利交易者加大新兴市场押注
item.description: 由于市场押注美联储将在下月启动降息，美元走软，刺激了市场对高收益货币的需求，套利交易在新兴市场投资者中卷土重来。【原文：Carry trade is making a comeback among emerging market investors as bets the Federal Reserve’s will kick off interest-rate cuts next month weaken the dollar and fuel appetite for high-yielding currencies.】

item.title: 新兴市场动态：美元走弱重振套利交易（播客）
item.description: 玛丽亚-埃莱娜-维斯凯诺（Maria Elena Vizcaino）与宋子嘉一起讨论新兴市场套利交易卷土重来的问题，因为投资者押注美联储最早将于下月推出的宽松货币政策将削弱美元，而且一些发展中国家的央行发出鹰派信号，将国内利率维持在较高水平。【原文：Maria Elena Vizcaino joins Zijia Song to discuss the comeback of the EM carry trade as investors bet that the Federal Reserve’s monetary easing as early as next month will weaken the dollar and as some central banks in developing nations send out hawkish signals that keep domestic interest rates at a high level.】

item.title: 苹果即将推出的人工智能语音控制将改变人们使用 iPhone 的方式
item.description: 苹果公司即将推出的新款 Siri 语音控制功能，如果成功的话，可能会成为一款低调的热门产品。还有：蒂姆-库克（Tim Cook）用供应链的微小变化（和一块金条）安抚了特朗普，苹果正在完成 iOS 26 和 Liquid Glass 1.0 的开发工作。最后，iPhone 制造商 Meta 失去了第五位人工智能工程师。【原文：Apple’s upcoming voice-control feature for the new Siri could be an under-the-radar hit — if it works. Also: Tim Cook placates Trump with minor supply-chain changes (and a bar of gold), and Apple is finishing up work on iOS 26 and Liquid Glass 1.0. Lastly, the iPhone maker loses a fifth AI engineer to Meta.】

item.title: 曾经的债券贱民与德国、法国并驾齐驱
item.description: 十五年前，吉列尔莫-费利克斯（Guillermo Felices）帮助客户应对欧洲主权债务危机。现在，他又开始大肆宣扬曾经处于风暴中心的债券。【原文：A decade and a half ago, Guillermo Felices was helping clients navigate Europe’s sovereign debt crisis. Now, he’s extolling the bonds once at the center of that storm.】

item.title: 法国巴鲁称公共假期削减 "有操作空间
item.description: 据《回声报》（Les Echos）报道，法国政府希望从 2026 年起从国家预算中节省 42 亿欧元（约合 49 亿美元），此前已宣布计划取消两个公共节假日，尽管还有 "回旋余地"。【原文：France’s government is aiming for savings of €4.2 billion euros ($4.9 billion) from the state budget starting 2026 with a previously-announced plan to eliminate two public holidays, even though there is “room for maneuver,” according to Les Echos.】

item.title: CATL 暂停中国锂矿生产三个月
item.description: 电池巨头当代安培科技股份有限公司（Contemporary Amperex Technology Co.据熟知内情的人士透露，当代安培（Amperex）科技股份有限公司已暂停中国江西省一座大型锂矿的生产，为期至少三个月。【原文：Battery giant Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Ltd. has suspended production at a major lithium mine in China’s Jiangxi province for at least three months, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 泰国国王批准任命维泰为泰国银行行长
item.description: 泰国国王玛哈-哇集拉隆功（Maha Vajiralongkorn）已批准任命威泰-拉塔纳功（Vitai Ratanakorn）为泰国新任央行行长，而两周多前内阁才选定这位经验丰富的银行家担任这一令人羡慕的职务。【原文：Thailand’s King Maha Vajiralongkorn has endorsed the appointment of Vitai Ratanakorn as the nation’s new central bank governor, more than two weeks after the cabinet picked the seasoned banker for the coveted role.】

item.title: 美国国债反弹受阻，关键消费者价格数据迫在眉睫
item.description: 在一份关键的通胀报告公布之前，国债收益率从三个月低点回升，该报告可能会影响市场对美联储最快将于下月降息的预期。【原文：Treasury yields rose from a three-month low ahead of a key inflation report that may shape market expectations that the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates as soon as next month.】

item.title: AFR 称太平洋股权投资公司即将达成收购 Spark 数据中心的交易
item.description: 据《澳大利亚金融评论报》（Australian Financial Review）报道，太平洋股权合伙公司（Pacific Equity Partners）正在就收购新西兰星火数据中心有限公司（Spark New Zealand Ltd.）的多数股权进行深入谈判，这笔交易对资产的估值将超过 6 亿新西兰元（约合 3.57 亿美元）。【原文：Pacific Equity Partners is in advanced talks to acquire a majority stake in Spark New Zealand Ltd.’s data center business in a deal that would value the assets at more than NZ$600 million ($357 million), the Australian Financial Review reported.】

item.title: 追求阳光的德国人因阿尔卑斯山度假拥堵而遭到瑞士人的反击
item.description: 瑞士对外国司机堵塞公路的容忍度越来越低，以至于一些政客现在想让他们为这一特权支付额外费用。【原文：Switzerland’s tolerance for foreign drivers clogging up its highways is wearing so thin that some politicians now want to make them pay extra for the privilege.】

item.title: 埃及通胀率连续第二个月下降，降息压力增大
item.description: 埃及通胀率连续第二个月放缓，这可能为这个北非国家恢复货币宽松周期提供了空间。【原文：Egypt inflation slowed for a second month, potentially giving the North African nation scope to resume a monetary-easing cycle.】

item.title: 特朗普关税有可能加深 6.3 万亿美元的印中股票缺口
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统对印度的关税升级使印度股市面临进一步落后于中国的风险，而印度一直试图取代中国，成为世界经济增长的下一个主要引擎。【原文：President Donald Trump’s tariff escalation with India is putting its stock market at risk of falling further behind China — the very country India has been trying to supplant as the world’s next major engine of growth.】

item.title: 比利亚维森西奥将被正式任命为哥伦比亚外交部长
item.description: 罗莎-比利亚维森西奥（Rosa Villavicencio）将被任命为哥伦比亚外交部长，因为这个安第斯国家正面临着与美国和邻国秘鲁关系紧张的问题。【原文：Rosa Villavicencio is set to be confirmed as Colombia’s foreign minister as the Andean nation faces fraying relations with the US and neighboring Peru.】

item.title: 美国通胀率将因关税提高而上升
item.description: 由于零售商逐步提高了进口关税较高的各种商品的价格，7 月份美国消费者的基本通胀率可能略有回升。【原文：US consumers probably experienced a slight pickup in underlying inflation in July as retailers gradually raised prices on a variety of items subject to higher import duties.】

item.title: 墨西哥确定番茄出口价格以缓和与特朗普的贸易摩擦
item.description: 在特朗普政府征收反倾销税后，墨西哥为出口到美国的新鲜番茄设定了最低价格，寻求重新获得全面的市场准入。【原文：Mexico set minimum prices for fresh tomato exports to the US, seeking to regain full access to the market after the Trump administration imposed an anti-dumping duty.】

item.title: 一切都很昂贵。无处藏身信贷周刊
item.description: 至少在一代人的时间里，信贷市场上的讨价还价者最难找到优惠。【原文：Credit market bargain shoppers are having the hardest time finding deals in at least a generation.】

item.title: 美联储鲍曼呼吁社区银行改革，赞成降息
item.description: 美联储理事米歇尔-鲍曼（Michelle Bowman）周六发布了两条重要消息，她宣布将于 10 月 9 日主办社区银行会议，并赞成今年降息三次。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Michelle Bowman delivered two key pieces of news on Saturday, announcing she will host an Oct. 9 community bank conference and favors three interest-rate cuts this year.】
